content: mini-octopus amigurumi crochet pattern by forever stitchin this listing is for the pdf crochet pattern not the finished product **this octopus is worked in 1 continuous piece from the bottom to the top ** for this project you will need to know basic crochet stitches increasing and decreasing the pattern includes instruction as well as a picture guide when necessary the completed creature will be approximately 6 inches long you will need 1 choice color of yarn option of black yarn 12mm safety eyes or googly eyes us f/3 75mm crochet hook a tapestry needle and stuffing to complete this pattern please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot give any refunds if you need any help i am happy to provide customer service to help with any of my designs please feel free to contact me at foreverstitchin@yahoo ca you are free to sell what you make from this pattern but you may not share copy or reproduce this pattern in part or whole photographs are also copyright protected you must use your photos of your own work please link back to my shop if selling your finished items online www foreverstitchin com www ravelry com/designers/forever-stitchin www facebook com/foreverstitchin
